Round_Rock.Dell Client Solutions Group:
Dell Client Solutions Group is a subsidiary of Dell Technologies retaining the Dell brand based in Round Rock, Texas, United States, that develops, sells, repairs, and supports computers and related products and services. Eponymously named after its founder, Michael Dell, the division holds one of the largest information technology brands in the world.


== History ==


=== Merger of Dell and EMC ===

On October 12, 2015, Dell announced its intent to acquire the enterprise software and storage company EMC Corporation.
